alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 11:01AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Wind Chill 40 to 60 Below... Wind Chill will hover in the 40 to 60 below range through the weekend. Cold temperatures continue in the Chukchi Sea and Norton Sound Regions with low temperatures in the 20s to 30s below, while high temperatures will be in the teens and 20s below. Wind will generally be less than 10 mph through Sunday, locally picking up to around 15 mph Sunday afternoon. Residents should use caution if they are outside and ensure that they are protected from the cold as frostbite can occur with less than 10 minutes of exposure.
